attributes.action: Make the Covid Pass available to all fully vaccinated, including 12-15 year olds
attributes.additional_details:
Currently the Covid pass is unavailable to under 16s, meaning all those at risk children being vaccinated may be subjected to unnecessary PCR testing in order to travel abroad.
 
The NHS website states “The NHS COVID Pass is not available for children under the age of 16. If you're travelling abroad, your child may need to show a negative test result.”
attributes.background: I would like the Government to ensure that anyone, regardless of age, is able to get the NHS Covid Pass when they have been fully vaccinated. Anything less is discrimination.
